Title: Protected Areas of the United States: Global Marine Protected Areas Database (MPA Global)

Lineage: Point locations generated from latitudes & longitudes provided by UNESCO, along with attribute information. Areas taken from the Directory of the World Network of Biosphere Reserves online.

Title: Ramsar Wetlands of International Importance
Lineage: Information from on Ramsar Bulletin Board and Ramsar News Archives accessed from March-June 2012. Polygons updated/created using national polygons.

Title: Protected areas of Argentina
Lineage: Not Reported

Title: Protected Areas of Argentina
Responsible Name: The Nature Conservancy (TNC) Latin America, Ecuador and UNESCO-MAB
Lineage: Spatial data sourced from TNC Latin American PA dataset 2008. Attribute data from previous source - metadata ID 988 - MAB website (updated 3rd June 2004), accessed June 2004.

Title: Sistema Nacional de Areas Protegidas - Republica Argentina
Lineage: Point data were derived from a dyeline 1:5,000,000 scale map Sistema Nacional de Areas Protegidas - República Argentina (1991), prepared by Rodolfo Burkart and Pedro Benavente at a scale of 1:5,000,000.

Title: Kure Atoll
Lineage: http://hawaiireef.noaa.gov/maps/maps.html; Data taken from the web site and converted into digital outlines at UNEP-WCMC.

Title: Protected Areas of Argentina
Responsible Name: Provincia de Rio Negro, Consejo de Ecologia y Medio Ambiente - Delegacion Bariloche
Lineage: D. Paz Barreto, Jan 1996. in litt

Title: Protected Areas of Argentina
Responsible Name: The Nature Conservancy (TNC) Latin America, Ecuador and Provincia de Rio Negro, Consejo de Ecologia y Medio Ambiente - Delegacion Bariloche
Lineage: Spatial data, names and designations sourced from TNC Latin American PA dataset 2008. All other attribute data from previous source - metadata ID 1007 - from 1996.

Title: Protected Areas of Argentina
Responsible Name: The Nature Conservancy (TNC) Latin America, Ecuador
Lineage: Spatial data, names and designations sourced from TNC Latin American PA dataset 2008. All other attribute data from previous source - metadata ID 926 - Kelleher, G., Bleakley, C. and Wells, S. (1995).

Title: Protected Areas of Liberia
Lineage: The Forestry Development Authority(FDA) provided the most recent dataset of protected areas in Liberia, which includes 2 gazetted sites and 13 proposed sites
Citation Text: Forestry Development Authority (2010) Protected Areas of Liberia

Title: Protected Areas of Argentina
Responsible Name: The Nature Conservancy (TNC) Latin America, Ecuador
Lineage: Spatial data, names and designations sourced from TNC Latin American PA dataset 2008. All other attribute data from previous unknown source of 'Merino' in 1987.

Responsible Name: The Nature Conservancy (TNC) Latin America, Ecuador and Administración de Parques Nacionales (APN), Argentina

Title: Protected Areas of Falkland Islands

Title: Parque Nacional Tierra del Fuego
